availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert F. Coleman (Burlington, Kentucky, attorney and judge)

body.p: Burlington, Kentucky, attorney and judge. Kentucky native. Attorney in Boone County in 1860. Presiding judge of the Boone County Court in Boone County in 1865.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Boone, Burlington, p. 39. Find A Grave,” Robert F. Coleman (1833-February 16, 1866),” Memorial #83869380, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=83869380 (accessed June 5, 2017). KYR-0001-005-0098.
